title: Build a custom payment flow with Stripe Elements
summary:
Learn how to set up Stripe Elements, a collection of pre-built UI components that enable a customized, conversion-optimized payment experience that matches your website or mobile app. This video will walk you through the different customizable UI components, features to help you increase conversion, advanced controls for tailoring the payment experience, and how to get started with your integration. Get started with Stripe today to build your ideal payment experience and start accepting online payments. 

Chapters:
00:00 Elements introduction
00:30 Understanding Elements
01:53 Advanced controls
02:20 Getting started

Resources: 
https://docs.stripe.com/payments/elements 
https://docs.stripe.com/payments/quickstart-checkout-sessions 

Get started with Stripe: https://stripe.com/register
